description: Sustainable Land and Ecosystem Management in Shifting Cultivation Areas of Nagaland for Ecological and Livelihood Security

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: Maintain ecosystem services while also meeting livelihood needs of local communities. It will involve all relevant government departments (Soil and Water Conservation;  To ensure that the tested approach can be effectively internalized in development planning for the State.
subproject.title: Shifting Cultivation
